solution_line_template: First find the time difference per problem: {time_per_problem_no_calculator} minutes/problem - {time_per_problem_with_calculator} minutes/problem = <<{time_per_problem_no_calculator}-{time_per_problem_with_calculator}={time_saved_per_problem}>>{time_saved_per_problem} minutes/problem

Then multiply that number by the number of problems to find the total time difference: {time_saved_per_problem} minutes/problem * {num_problems} problems = <<{time_saved_per_problem}*{num_problems}={total_time_saved}>>{total_time_saved} minutes
